properties.name: de.abat.key.pool.redis.enabled
properties.description: if redis is enabled or else ids will be generated on the fly

properties.name: de.abat.key.pool.base
properties.description: The base (base64, base62 etc) which each number should be transformed

properties.name: de.abat.key.pool.generator.step
properties.description: Batch insert step number for redis.
